title: The Eminence in The Dungeon
text: The apprentice sayeth yond that gent feeleth a dark'r aura and sayeth yond something dark awaits not too far ahead.  The h'ro unfold a lighteth which instantly draws that

buttons.text: You can feel the weak aura of the enemy and you decide to walk by while saying 'This aura, i cant handle it, i cant breath.' the hero ignores you
The hero finally thinks of you and walks you back until you can 'breath again'
